 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹג‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Lev.14.10|Lev 14:10]]</sup> ==a liquid measure== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לוּגָּה‎</span>; also <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***a (dessert -;) dish***, etc.; meaning of √ dubious; [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be deep***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***depth, abyss***); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> absolute [[Lev.14.10|Lev 14:10]] construct v[[Lev.14.12|Lev 14:12]] + 3 t. [[Lev.14|Lev 14]] always of oil (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁמֶן‎</span>) [[Lev.14.10|Lev 14:10]]; [[Lev.14.12|Lev 14:12]]; [[Lev.14.15|Lev 14:15]]; [[Lev.14.21|Lev 14:21]]; [[Lev.14.24|Lev 14:24]] ([[BDB#P|P]]; all in law of purification of leper); according to Talmud = 1/12 hin (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִין‎</span> above; Zuckermann<sup>Jüd. Mass. system, 49</sup>) i.e. approximately 1/2 litre; [[BDB#Benz|Benz]]<sup>Archaeology 182, 184</sup> [[BDB#Now|Now]]<sup>Archaeology i. 204f</sup>.
